Package states

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
states.State
states.Menu
All Implemented Interfaces:
StateMethods
public class Menu extends State implements StateMethods
This is a child class of State that implements the StateMethods interface. This represents the Main Menu of the game, it should be the first screen that the player sees and leads them to the Overworld.
Author:
johnbotonakis and Sean-Paul Brown
